This exceptional piece carries a unique value that extends beyond its tangible features, making it an invaluable asset for those seeking to lead innovation. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,000,000.

(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer

You chose to make a counteroffer to Alice.
